name: SpaceBall Galaxy
description:
You are a sphere and you must try to go to the next level, 
passing obstacles and finding the right way.
PC Windows game keys. 
W .- Go ahead 
S .- Back 
A .-left 
D .- Right 
 
P .- Pause 
Space .- Turbo 
Left Ctrl .- Press several times, brake.
XBOX Console Keys You can move with the arrows and analog.  
A and RT .- Turbo 
LT .- Brake 
Start .- Pause
